name: Sprite font
description: Displays some text on the screen using a sprite sheet.

conditions.name: Compare text
conditions.description: Compare the text in this object.

params.name: Text to compare
params.description: Enter the text to compare with the object's content.

params.name: Case sensitivity
params.description: Choose whether capital letters count as different to lowercase.  If ignoring case, "ABC" matches "abc".

conditions.name: Is running typewriter text
conditions.description: True if currently writing out typewriter text.

conditions.name: On typewriter text finished
conditions.description: Triggered when typewriter text finishes writing out all the text.

conditions.name: Has tag at position
conditions.description: Check if a BBcode tag style is set at a given position.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag to check for.

params.name: X
params.description: The X co-ordinate to check.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate to check.

actions.name: Set blend mode
actions.description: Set the background blend mode for this object.

params.name: Blend mode
params.description: Choose the new blend mode for this object.

actions.name: Set text
actions.description: Set the text of this object.

params.name: Text
params.description: Enter the text to set the object's content to.

actions.name: Append text
actions.description: Add text to the end of the existing text.

params.name: Text
params.description: Enter the text to append to the object's content.

actions.name: Set scale
actions.description: Set the scale of the spritefont image.

params.name: Scale
params.description: Enter the scale of the spritefont image.

actions.name: Set character spacing
actions.description: Set the spacing between each character.

params.name: Character spacing
params.description: Enter the number of pixels for the spacing between characters.

actions.name: Set line height
actions.description: Set the spacing between each line.

params.name: Line height
params.description: Enter the number of pixels for the spacing between lines.

actions.name: Set character width
actions.description: Change the width of some characters.

params.name: Character
params.description: Enter one or more characters to change the width for (e.g. "abcd").

params.name: Width
params.description: Enter the number of pixels width you want the character(s) to occupy. This should be less than the cell width.

actions.name: Set horizontal alignment
actions.description: Set the horizontal alignment of the text.

params.name: Horizontal alignment
params.description: Choose the new horizontal alignment for the text.

actions.name: Set vertical alignment
actions.description: Set the vertical alignment of the text.

params.name: Vertical alignment
params.description: Choose the new vertical alignment for the text.

actions.name: Typewriter text
actions.description: Set the text over time by starting with an empty string and gradually adding characters.

params.name: Text
params.description: Enter the text to set the object's content to over time.

params.name: Duration
params.description: The time in seconds to write out the text.

actions.name: Finish typewriter
actions.description: Force a typewriter text effect to finish immediately.

actions.name: Set wrapping
actions.description: Set whether to wrap text by space-separated words or by character.

params.name: Wrapping
params.description: Wrap text by space-separated words or by character.

actions.name: Set read aloud
actions.description: Set whether the text is read aloud while using a screen reader.

params.name: Enable
params.description: Whether to enable reading aloud.

expressions.name: CharacterWidth
expressions.description: Get the width of a character.

params.name: Character
params.description: Character to get width for (empty for default)

expressions.name: CharacterHeight
expressions.description: Get the height of a character.

expressions.name: CharacterScale
expressions.description: Get the scale of the characters.

expressions.name: TextWidth
expressions.description: Get the width extent of the text in the object in pixels.

expressions.name: TextHeight
expressions.description: Get the height extent of the text in the object in pixels.

expressions.name: PlainText
expressions.description: Get the object's text with any BBcode tags stripped out.

expressions.name: TagAtPosition
expressions.description: Get the BBcode tag style at a given position, or an empty string if none.

params.name: X
params.description: The X co-ordinate to check.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate to check.

expressions.name: TagCount
expressions.description: Get the number of BBcode style tags for a specific tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag to use.

expressions.name: TagX
expressions.description: Get X co-ordinate of a BBcode style tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag to use.

params.name: Index
params.description: The tag index, in case there are multiple.

expressions.name: TagY
expressions.description: Get Y co-ordinate of a BBcode style tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag to use.

params.name: Index
params.description: The tag index, in case there are multiple.

expressions.name: TagWidth
expressions.description: Get width of a BBcode style tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag to use.

params.name: Index
params.description: The tag index, in case there are multiple.

expressions.name: TagHeight
expressions.description: Get height of a BBcode style tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag to use.

params.name: Index
params.description: The tag index, in case there are multiple.
